item.title: unknown_u16_type
item.author: chennqqi@qq.com (chennqqi)
item.description: issue: gcc build error error: unknown type name ‘u16’ solution: install kernel-headers sudo yum install kernel-headers -y referer: https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?format=multiple&id=689756
